New Records: Logan Driscoll hit his first career homer, a two-run shot.
Key Match Events: Zack Littell shut down Cleveland for six innings.
Jhonkensy Noel and David Fry hit back-to-back doubles in the eighth inning.
Edwin Uceta worked a 1-2-3 ninth for his third save.
Jonathan Aranda homered for the Rays.
Jose Siri narrowly missed a homer with a blast to center field that hit the yellow line marking the top of the wall.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland's loss coupled with Kansas City's win reduced the Guardians' division lead to three games.
The Guardians played without All-Star left fielder Steven Kwan, who was scratched from the starting lineup due to 'body fatigue'.
Rays' LF Christoper Morel was replaced after hitting a single in the third inning due to right Achilles tendon discomfort.
